name: Hamsters In The Dark
description:
Your spaceship has taken damage and is leaking precious oxygen into the cold vacuum of space...worse still, the hamsters have escaped from the engine room! Can you catch the hamsters, restore power to the ship and send a distress signal before you run out of air? 

Use WASD & Spacebar to move & interact with the environment. Go quickly because time is short!

Made as part of the International Education Game Jam 2022, by Group 1:

Olivia F, Layenna J, Joeri v A, Beer P, Martyn W.
